body: query {userlist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ users { id, auth0_id, name, active, termsandconditions, acl { account { id, name, active }, role { id, name, active } }, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip, country }, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page, last_evaluated } }, }
